channel.title: Think your smart ~ read this
channel.description: hi guys,well here is the problem i have a client (my own ! not leeched) and i need to run it (ovo ) to play is but every time i hit "run with GUI" it just flashes here is what is inside it [code]@ECHO OFF color 77 title server name here echo Running elementalscape JAVA -Xmx500m client [/code] what is the correct code for my [size=7][COLOR=RED]CLIENT[/COLOR][/size] RUN [size=5]i will post back if any code works up 2 now no code has worked D: [/size][br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 24, 2008, 12:48:09 pm[/size][hr]no 1 knows :eek:

item.title: Think your smart ~ read this
item.dc:creator: @sticky_wicky sticky wicky
item.description:
@sticky_wicky wrote:

hi guys,well here is the problem i have a client (my own ! not leeched) and i need to run it (ovo ) to play is but every time i hit “run with GUI”
it just flashes here is what is inside it

@ECHO OFF color 77 title server name here echo Running elementalscape JAVA -Xmx500m client
what is the correct code for my [size=7][COLOR=RED]CLIENT[/COLOR][/size] RUN
[size=5]i will post back if any code works up 2
now no code has worked D: [/size][br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 24, 2008, 12:48:09 pm[/size][hr]no 1 knows :eek:
